channel.title: Questional Ethics: death bodies don't vaporize
channel.description:
Hi,
U can vaporize Vortigaunts, headcrabs, an agent following you (sadistic I know)
But the bodies of scientists laying on the ground already don't vaporize
I thought every tissue made of flesh of natural material would vaporize

item.title: Questional Ethics: death bodies don't vaporize
item.dc:creator: Xeoxer
item.description:
It also bugged me while destroying the bullsquid in room with crossbow. I think this needs to be fixed.

Read full topic
item.source: Questional Ethics: death bodies don't vaporize
